title: IEA Wind TCP Task 43 Digital Calibration Certificate
description: JSON Schema for IEC61400-12-1:2017 complient anemometer calibration certificates.

version.title: Version
version.description: The version of the IEA DCC this file is based on. The format of this follows Semantic Versioning with the year and month tagged on after. E.g. 1.1.1-2020.07

calibration_id.title: Calibration ID
calibration_id.description: Unique number assigned to the calibration/certificate by the calibration lab. Also called 'calibration mark', etc.

calibration_lab.title: Calibration Lab
calibration_lab.description: General information about the calibration lab.

accreditation_id.title: Accredition ID
accreditation_id.description: The accreditation / calibration lab id if applicable.

reference.title: Reference
reference.description: The reference / order code supplied by the customer.

test_item.title: Test Item
test_item.description: Information about the test item. Also known as Device Under Test (DUT).

model.title: Model
model.description: The model number of the test item.

serial_number.title: Serial Number
serial_number.description: Serial number(s) or similiar, seperated by a ',' e.g. <body>,<cup>

description.title: Description
description.description: General description of the test item.

setup.title: Setup
setup.description: Setup information specific to the calibration.

date_of_calibration.title: Date of Calibration
date_of_calibration.description: The date the calibration took place.

procedure.title: Procedure
procedure.description: The calibration procedure used for the calibration.

wind_tunnel_id.title: Wind Tunnel ID
wind_tunnel_id.description: Identification of the wind tunnel the calibration took place.

mounting_diameter.title: Mounting Diameter
mounting_diameter.description: The diameter of the mounting tube.

mounting_length.title: Mounting Length
mounting_length.description: The mounting tube length as used inside the test section.

yaw_orientation.title: Mounting Orientation
yaw_orientation.description: The yaw orientation/direction of the test item during calibration if the test item is directionally sensitive. The angle is defined as the angle from the test item north marker to the upwind direction as measured clockwise when seen from above. If the test item is not directionally sensitive you can simply leave this out or set as null. Additional comments or alternative definitions should be added to the notes attribute (e.g. 'cable downstream').

table.title: Table
table.description: The calibration result in a tabular format.

coverage_factor.description: Coverage factor k associated with the uncertainty (VIM 2.38).

index.title: Index
index.description: The unique index of the calibration point.

reference.title: Reference
reference.description: The reference or measurement standard, in this case air velocity.

deviation.title: Deviation
deviation.description: The deviation between the reference and test_item when applying the obtained calibration equation.
